alert.note: Alert for Spencer (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 5:59PM EST until March 01 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN SPENCER...CENTRAL DAVIESS...EAST CENTRAL HENDERSON AND NORTH CENTRAL MCLEAN COUNTIES... At 458 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Owensboro, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Owensboro, Masonville, St. Joseph, Stanley and Moseleyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 66 and 70. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 14 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
